Ayoa Privacy Policy

What information we collect about you
If the ownership of all, or substantially all, our business changes, we may transfer your information to the new owner so that the Services can continue to operate.
If you register for an Ayoa account, we will use your information to provide the Services to you.
We keep your information secure by taking appropriate technical and organisational measures against its unauthorised or unlawful processing and against its accidental loss, destruction or damage.
We may provide access to or share your information with third parties who perform services on our behalf.
We may retain your information for a longer period in the event of a complaint or if we reasonably believe there is a prospect of litigation in respect to our relationship with you.
We will only retain your information for as long as reasonably necessary to fulfil the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, regulatory, tax, accounting or reporting requirements.
Clicking on those links or enabling those connections may allow third parties to collect or share data about you.
We will also store data of the orders made by you, your interests and preferences.

For example, if you create an account or log into the Services using your Google credentials, we receive your name and email address as permitted by your Google profile settings in order to authenticate you.
We also receive your email address from other Service users when they provide it in order to invite you to the Services.
We collect information about your computer, phone, tablet or other devices you use to access the Services.

We automatically collect information about you when you use our Services.
We collect information about you when you input it into the Services or otherwise provide it directly to us.
We receive information about you when you or your administrator enable third-party apps or integrate or link a third-party service with our Services.

When you connect your account with a third-party service via an integration, we will share information about you that is required to provide the integration between the third-party service and our Services.
We support integrations with several Google services and therefore access, collect, use and store information about you that you provide when you register to use Ayoa.
